document.full_text: in what could be a politically explosive decision, prosecutors have decided not to pursue a case against two chinese supervisors who shot 13 coal miners during a wage protest in 2010.
document.title: zambia drops case of shooting by chinese mine bosses
lines_and_colors: in what could be a politically explosive decision, prosecutors have decided not to pursue a case against two chinese supervisors who shot 13 coal miners during a wage protest in 2010.
